name: Happy! Happy!! Boarders in Hokkaido Rusutsu Resort
name_original: Happy! Happy!! Boarders in Hokkaido Rusutsu Resort
description: Happy! Happy!! Boarders in Hokkaido Rusutsu Resort (ハッピー！　ハッピー！！　ボーダーズ in Hokkaido ルスツ　リゾート) is a Snowboarding video game published by Atlus released on December 14th, 2000 for the PlayStation 2.
